main.summary: Source generator that creates the ProtectedOperationResolver.
main.remarks: This generator discovers methods decorated with the AccessCheckAttribute, and uses the method names and the integer indices provided in the attributes to build a ResolveIndex method.

property.name: AttributeFullName
property.summary: The fully qualified name of the attribute used to mark protected operations.

method.name: Execute
method.summary: The main execution method for the source generator.
method.param: The collection of method syntax nodes that have been identified as protected operations.
The source production context, used to add the generated source file.

method.name: IsSyntaxForGeneration
method.summary: A filter to determine if a syntax node could possibly be a candidate for generation.
method.returns: if the node is a method declaration with attributes; otherwise, .

method.name: GenerateResolver
method.summary: Generates the source code for the `ProtectedOperationResolver` class.
method.param: The list of protected operation names and their corresponding indices.
method.returns: A string containing the complete source code for the generated class.

method.name: GetMethodInfos
method.summary: Extracts the necessary information (method name and operation index) from the method syntax nodes.
method.param: The collection of method syntax nodes.
method.returns: A list of tuples, where each tuple contains the name and index of a protected operation.

method.name: GetSemanticTargetForGeneration
method.summary: Performs a semantic check to confirm if a syntax node is a method decorated with the AccessCheckAttribute.
method.param: The generator syntax context, which provides access to the semantic model.
method.returns: The if it has the correct attribute; otherwise, .
